content.rendered:
Air Saint-Pierre is a French airline based in Saint-Pierre, Saint Pierre and Miquelon, a French overseas collectivity. The airline operates scheduled services between the islands of Saint-Pierre and Miquelon-Langlade and to Canada.The airline was founded in 1964 and originally flew in cooperation with Eastern Provincial Airways. The first aircraft was a Piper Aztec, which was put into service to a service to Sydney, Nova Scotia.

Air Saint-Pierre Address : 18 rue Albert Briand, BP 4225, 97500 Saint-Pierre & Miquelon

Phone : +05.08.41.00.00

Fax: +05.08.41.00.02

Email: contact@airsaintpierre.com

Opening hours: Monday to Friday : 08h30 – 12h00
13h30 – 17h00
Saturday : Closed
Sunday : Closed

Central Reservations for Flight Inquiries/Reservations
From North America (Bilingual Services) :

Phone :(709) 726-9700
Toll Free : 1-877-277-7765
Fax:(709) 726-9701
Email:reservation@airsaintpierre.com
Opening hours:
Monday to Friday: 09h00-17h00
Saturday: Closed
Sunday: Closed

Note: The Central Reservations Office is closed for all statutory Canadian Holidays.

From France (French Services) :

Phone : +05.08.41.00.00
Fax: +05.08.41.00.02
Email: contact@airsaintpierre.com
Opening hours:
Monday to Friday : 08h30–12h00
13h30–17h00
Saturday: Closed
Sunday: Closed

Stations – Miquelon / St. John’s / Halifax

Miquelon
Miquelon Address :
BP 4225, 97500 Saint-Pierre, Miquelon
Phone : +05.08.41.65.85
Email: miquelon@airsaintpierre.com

St. John’s, NL
St. John’s, NL Address :
100 World Parkway, Airport Terminal Building, PO Box 12, St-John’s, NL, Canada, A1A 5T2
Phone : (709) 726-9700
Fax: (709) 726-9701
Email: stjohns@airsaintpierre.com
Opening hours:
Monday to Friday: 09h00-17h00 Telephone :
Saturday: Closed
Sunday: Closed

Halifax, NS
Halifax, NS Address :
Halifax Stanfield International Airport, 747 Bell Blvd, PO Box 1660, Goffs, NS, Canada, B2T 1K2
Phone : (902) 873 3566
Fax: (902) 873 3567
Email: halifax@airsaintpierre.com
Opening hours:
Monday to Friday: 09h00-15h30
Saturday and Sunday: Closed

Air Saint-Pierre Official website : http://airsaintpierre.com/en/

Fleet size: 03

  • ATR 42-500
  • ATR 42-600
  • Reims-Cessna F406

Air Saint-Pierre Baggage Allowance

Air Saint-Pierre Baggage

View Air Saint-Pierre Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy
